list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: gone by in time and no longer existing.
the time or a period of time before the moment of speaking or writing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she found it hard to make ends meet in the past

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a simple past of the first conjugation
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một quá khứ đơn giản trong liên hợp đầu tiên
